agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Land & Resource Management TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 2, 2019 PLACE: E2.012 CHAIR: Rep. Tom Craddick HB 1367 Harris | et al. Relating to the disposition of real property intended for high-speed rail projects. HB 1672 Calanni Relating to the powers and duties of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 375; providing authority to issue bonds. HB 1673 Calanni Relating to the powers and duties of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 376; providing authority to issue bonds. HB 1674 Calanni Relating to the powers and duties of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 377; providing authority to issue bonds. HB 1676 Calanni Relating to the powers and duties of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 378; providing authority to issue bonds. HB 1677 Calanni Relating to the powers and duties of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 379; providing authority to issue bonds. HB 1678 Calanni Relating to the powers and duties of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 380; providing authority to issue bonds. HB 2018 Thierry Relating to required notice for municipal management districts that annex or exclude territory. HB 2442 Phelan Relating to the exchange of certain state property in Orange County by the Public Safety Commission. HB 2589 Lozano Relating to county consent for certain municipal annexations. HB 2590 Biedermann Relating to the administration, powers, and duties of a municipal utility district. HB 2671 Calanni Relating to the creation of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 569; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 3047 Bell, Cecil Relating to the creation of the Montgomery County Municipal Utility District No. 167; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 3167 Oliverson Relating to the procedure for approval of certain land development applications by a political subdivision. HB 3169 Guillen Relating to continuation of land use for an area containing a permanent retail structure after municipal annexation. HB 3371 Darby Relating to the regulation of certain battery-charged fences by municipalities and counties. HB 3417 Toth Relating to the applicability of certain municipal ordinances in the municipality's extraterritorial jurisdiction. HB 3422 Stephenson Relating to the creation of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 231; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 3454 Toth Relating to the release of extraterritorial jurisdiction by a municipality involving certain areas. HB 3477 Paul Relating to the authority of a municipality to enforce certain municipal building regulations. HB 3636 Morrison Relating to the transfer of certain state property from the Texas Department of Criminal Justice to DeWitt County. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
